Package game.environments

Class SpawnableGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.SpawnableGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Spawnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barrack, Cage, Graveyard, GustOfWind, PuddleOfWater, SummonSign
public abstract class SpawnableGround extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground implements Spawnable
An abstract class that represents a Ground that can spawn Enemies. Created by:
Version:
1.0

Bryan Wong Modified by:

  • Constructor Details

    • SpawnableGround

      public SpawnableGround(char displayChar, String name, int spawningLimit)
      SpawnableGround Constructor. Will call setters to set data attributes of SpawnableGround using parameters given. Calls parent class to set inherited data attributes. Default create an empty ArrayList for spawnedEnemies at creation.
      Parameters:
      displayChar - : Character to display for this type of terrain.
      name - : String that signifies the name of the Ground.
      spawningLimit - : Integer representing the limit of spawnable Enemies this Ground can spawn.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      A method to return the name data attribute.
      Returns:
      the name of the Ground.

    • getSpawningLimit

      public int getSpawningLimit()
      A method to return the spawningLimit data attribute.
      Returns:
      the limit of spawnable Enemies this Ground can spawn.

    • getSpawningFactory

      public SpawningFactory getSpawningFactory()
      A method to return the spawningFactory data attribute.
      Returns:
      the SpawningFactory instance representing the factory to spawn certain Enemies on certain side of the map.

      A method to set the spawningFactory data attribute.

    • tick

      public void tick(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      SpawnableGround can also experience the joy of time. Check whether its on the West or East side of the map to spawn different Enemies. Will call spawn method every tick and decide whether to spawn the Enemy or not.
      Overrides:
      tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the Ground to spawn the Enemy.
